The user spits out a small purple liquid at the target, which evaporates in [[wikipedia:acidic|acidic]] fashion, when in contact with the target. It is shown to be powerful enough to incapacitate [[Kushina Uzumaki]], even though she was only hit with a small part of the liquid on her leg.

== Trivia ==
* The [[Genjutsu World]] version of [[Gamabunta]] is able to use this technique.<ref>''Road to Ninja: Naruto the Movie''</ref>
